channel.title: Three Body Blog
channel.description: Weakness and ignorance are not barriers to survival, but arrogance is.

item.title: Perfect presentation of Project Guzheng in video
item.description: Tencent successfully adapted the Guzheng Project from the novel Three-Body into a TV series. The production team preserved the key plot and charm of the original story, while adding details and scenes. This resulted in high praise from fans of the novel.

item.title: My Three Body
item.description: My Three Body is an animation and use art of Minecraft.

item.title: [Three Body] by Tencent
item.description: Three Body is a TV series produced by Tencent, adapted from the first book of the Three-Body novel series, consisting of 30 episodes.

item.title: Zhuang Yan is not the person Luo Ji imagined
item.description: Luo Ji thought that Zhuang Yan was the person recommended by Shi Qiang according to his request, but in fact, Shi Qiang deceived him.

item.title: Shi Qiang already knew Zhuang Yan
item.description: Shi Qiang close ties to high-ranking officials, including Chang Weisi, and is suspected to be the son of Chang's old comrade-in-arms. Shi Qiang is a criminal investigator and veteran who uses unconventional methods and exudes a strong military presence.

item.title: Who could be Zhuang Yan?
item.description: This document proposes that Zhuang Yan, a character in Liu Cixin's "The Three-Body Problem", is the daughter of a peace-loving naturalist and martyr named Zhuang Yuhao. The theory is supported by quotes from another of Liu's novels, "Full Spectrum Barrage Jamming".
